raw.description: Race of the respondent (hispanic, black or white)
raw.name: race

raw.description: Sex of the respondent (male or female)
raw.name: sex

raw.description: A boolean variable that equals 1 if the respondent was jailed between 1985 to 1994
raw.name: ever_jailed

raw.description: A composite variable creating by summing five wealth variables from the NLS data for the year 1985
raw.name: composite_wealth_1985

raw.description: A composite variable creating by summing five wealth variables from the NLS data for the year 1990
raw.name: composite_wealth_1990

raw.description: A composite variable creating by summing five wealth variables from the NLS data for the year 1996
raw.name: composite_wealth_1996

datasets.description: This dataset was created from the National Longitudinal Study of Youth's 1979 cohort to about the race, wealth, and incarceration status of the participants.
datasets.name: nls_incarceration_processed.csv

queries.question: What kind of demographic disparities exist in median wealth in 1985 among individuals who were ever incarcerated?
